headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Newmont (NEM) After A 175% One-Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Newmont is still reasonably priced after its strong run, you are not alone. This article is here to help you assess what you might actually be paying for today. The stock last closed at US$125.80, with returns of 4.2% over 7 days, 10.2% over 30 days, 24.3% year to date and 174.9% over the past year. This naturally raises questions about how much of the story is already in the price. Recent news flow around Newmont has focused on its position as a major precious...

headline: Is Allied Gold's Higher Gold Production a Catalyst for Future Growth?
summary: AAUC ramps up output past 375,000 ounces target for 2025, fueled by Mali gains and a key Sadiola milestone boosting efficiency.

headline: Top U.S. General Joins the Fight for Rare Earth Security
summary: For years, the US depended on foreign suppliers of rare earth elements, but an all-American company is now looking to bring the entire rare earth supply chain back home
